subject: Missing item
description_text:
I purchased a set of pedals from amazon and got the one that came with the baseplate. But when i opened the box there was no baseplate. 

I would really appreciate if the missing item could be sent quickly as i’ve already waited awhile for the original package. 

Here is the amazon order number: Order #
111-2249055-3523415

conversations.body_text: Hi Brayden,  Hello, your order is expected to arrive within the next couple of days, and we will arrange shipment immediately upon receipt.
已补发，亚马逊后台已回复
